summary: This bill, the "Save our Allies Congressional Gold Medal Act," proposes awarding a Congressional Gold Medal to Chad Robichaux, Sarah Verardo, Tim Kennedy, Kevin Rourke, Sean Gabler, Dave Johnson, and Dennis Price. The medal recognizes their efforts during the 2021 Afghanistan evacuation, which resulted in the safe evacuation of over 17,000 people. The bill outlines the presentation, design, and display of the medal, including provisions for duplicate bronze medals. It also covers the medal's status as a national medal and numismatic item, authorizing the use of the United States Mint Public Enterprise Fund for costs.
